name: SevereShockAndResuscitationProcedures
title: Severe Shock and Resuscitation Procedures
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of procedures for severe shock and resuscitation.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a procedure of a procedure for severe shock and resuscitation.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
